pages.title: Withered Catalyst
pages.text: A catalyst extracted from the soul of the Wither. As a boss, it's immune to statuses, so Daggers have a 20% chance of dropping a Catalyst when hitting it.
Complete the Catalyst by absorbing the correct souls, until the process is finished and the Catalyst appears.

When used in a Runic Artifact, a Withered Catalyst produces Withered Materia. Withered Materia can be consumed for experience or transformed into Withered Skeleton Skulls, Netherite Scraps or Withered Stars.
